console.log(bobBalance.toString())
bobBalance = await steve.balanceOf(bob.address)
await steve.transfer(bob.address, 10)
await steve.unpauseToken()
await steve.transfer(bob.address, 10)
await steve.transfer(bob.balance, 10)
await steve.pauseToken()
console.log(bobBalance.toString())
let bobBalance = await steve.balanceOf(bob.address)
console.log(await steve.balanceOf(bob.address).toString())
console.log(await steve.balanceOf(bob.address))
await steve.transfer(bob.address, 10)
await steve.unpauseToken()
await steve.pauseToken()
let aliceBalance = await steve.balanceOf(alice.address)
const steve = await Token.deploy("Steve Token of Gratitude", "STEVE", BigInt("1000"))
const Token = await ethers.getContractFactory('Steve')
const [alice, bob] = await ethers.getSigners()
await steve.connect(bob).mintFurther(BigInt('1000'))
console.log(aliceBalance.toString())
aliceBalance = await steve.balanceOf(alice.address)
let mint = await steve.mintFurther(BigInt('500'))
console.log(aliceBalance.toString())
console.log(aliceBalance)
let aliceBalance = await steve.balanceOf(alice.address)
const steve = await Token.deploy("Steve token of Gratitude", "STEVE", BigInt("1000"))
const Token = await ethers.getContractFactory("Steve")
const [alice, bob] = await ethers.getSigners()
console.log(ownerBalance.toString())
console.log(ownerBalance)
const ownerBalance = await steve.balanceOf(alice.address)
const ownerBalance = await steve.balanceOf(alice)
const steve = await Token.deploy("Steve token of Gratitude", "STEVE", BigInt("100000000000000000000"))
const steve = await Token.deploy()
const Token = await ethers.getContractFactory("Steve")
console.log(alice)
const [alice, bob] = await ethers.getSigners()
